# ğŸ“š Library Management System

A simple command-line Python project that manages a small library using `set` operations. This system allows book inventory management, book issuing to users, and comparison of issued books between users.

## ğŸš€ Features

- ğŸ“¦ **Backup of books**
- â• Add new books
- â– Remove existing books
- ğŸ“– View available books
- ğŸ“¤ Issue books to users (`user1`, `user2`, `user3`)
- ğŸ“¥ Return books from users
- ğŸ“š View all issued books
- ğŸ§® View full book list
- ğŸ” Compare issued books between users
- âœ… Check subset, superset, and disjoint status
- ğŸ§¹ Clear all books
- âŒ Exit the system

## ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Users & Books

The system manages:
- A collection of classic and modern books
- Predefined users: `user1`, `user2`, `user3`
- Books issued to each user
